docs.abstract: Russian officials finally concede its athletes participated in widespread doping program that corrupted results at 2014 Olympics in Sochi; deny top officials including Pres Vladimir V Putin had any involvement; focus on need to reform international doping system in bid to restore its credibility as host of future events.

headline.main: Russians No Longer Dispute Olympic Doping Operation

docs.abstract: Struggling National Women’s Hockey League unveils official policy on treatment of transgender players; has assumed pioneering position on issue since Buffalo Beauts forward Harrison Browne came out publicly as transgender man.
